meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>large</kanji> <kanji>quantity</kanji> is a <vocabulary>large quantity</vocabulary>. Kind of like the <vocabulary>large number</vocabulary> of words you're learning here now. A <vocabulary>huge amount</vocabulary>. Well done you.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
